title: Can't download video in Facebook container tabs
content: Hello, I am not incredibly tech-savvy, so please bear with me. When I am in a Facebook container tab and I click a link to a video, a new tab opens and suddenly all the tabs I have open in Facebook start flashing. All I can do is close Firefox. If I open it again, the page is blank and the tabs have stopped flickering. Is there a solution to this problem? I have about a dozen tabs open, roughly half are in Facebook containers. Please help! Thanks.
creator: 75pintail

title: Bookmarks Toolbar clickable area reduced to bottom edge only
content: I think this started after my most recent upgrade - I'm currently on 108.0.1, but I suspect it was an upgrade from 107, not just from 108.0 (I use PortableApps and only upgrade through PA, and it takes time for PA to prep new versions of app, so sometimes short-lived versions are skipped, and the 108.0.1 changelog only mentions one tiny bug fix). When trying to access a bookmark or folder on my bookmarks toolbar, nothing happens (color change or tooltip on hover, nor clicking) unless the mouse is at the very bottom edge of the button area, well below where the icon and text are. Is this happening to anyone else? I use the bookmarks toolbar heavily, so this is very annoying.
creator: osakawebbie

title: Doing a simple search with a few words with Google and it doesn't search.  The page is all white
content:
It is intermittent but very annoying. I simply searched one word, "twitter". Then nothing appears, white page. So, I cut/paste the google search address and this is what it is:

https://www.google.com/search?q=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dtw%26source%3Dhp%26ei%3DatqsY4OhDLGk5NoPh5qCwAE%26iflsig%3DAJiK0e8AAAAAY6zoegj_QIdLCFPb9t46OS3bVfCKbldI%26ved%3D0ahUKEwiD_vu9xJ38AhUxElkFHQeNABgQ4dUDCAk%26uact%3D5%26oq%3Dtw%26gs_lcp%3DCgdnd3Mtd2l6EAMyBwgAELEDEEMyDQguEMcBELEDENEDEEMyCgguEMcBENEDEEMyCggAELEDEIMBEEMyCgguEMcBEK8BEEMyBAgAEEMyCAgAEIAEELEDMgcILhDUAhBDMgsILhCABBCxAxCDATIECAAQQzoFCAAQkQI6CAguENQCEJECOg4ILhCABBCxAxDHARDRAzoLCAAQgAQQsQMQgwE6BQguEIAEOgsILhCABBDHARDRA1AAWI4EYPkOaABwAHgAgAFbiAGpAZIBATKYAQCgAQE%26sclient%3Dgws-wiz&ei=7dqsY9qlILnw5NoPxKehwAo&ved=0ahUKEwia0Mv8xJ38AhU5OFkFHcRTCKgQ4dUDCA8&uact=5&oq=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dtw%26source%3Dhp%26ei%3DatqsY4OhDLGk5NoPh5qCwAE%26iflsig%3DAJiK0e8AAAAAY6zoegj_QIdLCFPb9t46OS3bVfCKbldI%26ved%3D0ahUKEwiD_vu9xJ38AhUxElkFHQeNABgQ4dUDCAk%26uact%3D5%26oq%3Dtw%26gs_lcp%3DCgdnd3Mtd2l6EAMyBwgAELEDEEMyDQguEMcBELEDENEDEEMyCgguEMcBENEDEEMyCggAELEDEIMBEEMyCgguEMcBEK8BEEMyBAgAEEMyCAgAEIAEELEDMgcILhDUAhBDMgsILhCABBCxAxCDATIECAAQQzoFCAAQkQI6CAguENQCEJECOg4ILhCABBCxAxDHARDRAzoLCAAQgAQQsQMQgwE6BQguEIAEOgsILhCABBDHARDRA1AAWI4EYPkOaABwAHgAgAFbiAGpAZIBATKYAQCgAQE%26sclient%3Dgws-wiz&gs_lcp=Cgxnd3Mtd2l6LXNlcnAQAzIKCAAQRxDWBBCwAzIKCAAQRxDWBBCwAzIKCAAQRxDWBBCwAzIKCAAQRxDWBBCwAzIKCAAQRxDWBBCwAzIKCAAQRxDWBBCwAzIKCAAQRxDWBBCwAzIKCAAQRxDWBBCwA0oECEEYAEoFCEASATFKBAhGGABQqQdYqQdgrBdoAXABeACAAQCIAQCSAQCYAQCgAQKgAQHIAQjAAQE&sclient=gws-wiz-serp

When it is working normally, I get a normal, fast result. I did the same "twitter" search I mentioned above and then I cut/paste from the address bar in google for you below, which is a normal result:

https://twitter.com/home

I've deleted cache and cookies, rebooted, etc. I've checked and the Firefox version is up to date.

What can I do to fix this? Thx
creator: josephjc2003

title: Toolbar
content: I would like to have the X button beside the refresh button that stops a page from loading. How do I get this back?
creator: myleslr
